title: Ram Singh Charlie
plot: A Lovely Little Film About A Family Of Circus Artistes.

Ram Singh used to play Charlie's role in a circus. But the owners of the circus shut down the circus, now Ram Singh has nothing left to live on in life, he starts to run Rickshaw for livelihood, But then one day his wife advises him that he should start the circus again, Accepting his wife, he starts trying to start the circus again. But then suddenly something happens, That his dream remains incomplete, After all, what happened that Charlie could not fulfill his dream.

After a circus company shuts down, its artists survives with odd jobs. Central character is a circus artist Ram Singh playing Charlie in circus. He is dedicated to his art but leaves behind his dream job and move ahead in life. But the dream knocks back, can relive it.

Ram Singh, a Charlie impersonator, performs in a traveling circus, who has always lived the life of an artist. He is unexpectedly thrown into the bigger circus of life where he has to now juggle between his role as a father and that of a performer, all without a safety net. He loses a part of himself in a world that has little space for dreams, and soon decides to do whatever he wants.
